text: The streets will be alive with the sound of music April 23 when James Corden ’ s third Carpool Karaoke primetime special welcomes Christina Aguilera ( in the car ) and Allison Janney, Anna Faris, Kunal Nayyar and Iain Armitage ( in the street ). The Late Late Show Carpool Karaoke Primetime Special will feature at least two of the CBS late night show ’ s fan - favorite bits, with Aguilera duetting with Corden in a new Carpool Karaoke bit and Faris and Janney ( Mom ), Nayyar ( The Big Bang Theory ) and Young Sheldon ‘ s Armitage joining the host in “ Crosswalk the Musical : The Sound of Music, ” in which Corden and guests stage fairly elaborate traffic - stopping versions of famous
